title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. L, pt. 4202 - Industrial Effectiveness Program-the Qualification Process
content:

State Regulations
§ 4202.1 - Purpose
§ 4202.2 - Purposes of the Industrial Effectiveness Program

§ 4202.4 - Threshold criteria to qualify individual industrial firms for industrial effectiveness assistance
§ 4202.5 - Threshold criteria to qualify groups of industrial firms for industrial effectiveness assistance
§ 4202.6 - Threshold criteria to qualify industrial firms or purchasing groups for local buy-out assistance

N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. L, pt. 4202

Statutory authority: Economic Development Law, §§ 190-196; N.Y.S. Urban Development Corporation Act, §§ 3, 10; Omnibus Economic

Development Act of 1987, § 7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
